about_the_game:
"I’m your pure and friendly night ghost, NightMare~!"

Starring VTuber NightMare herself! An ASMR-Enhanced Visual Novel Game!

Get ready for a heart-fluttering date experience with Mare!

Enjoy sweet and immersive moments through ASMR-enhanced voice lines that will bring you even closer to Mare🤍

🤍Synopsis🤍

A peculiar daily life begins with a pure-hearted ghost girl...

[Mare], a sweet and gentle ghost girl has suddenly appeared in front of the exhausted protagonist.

Although she’s a ghost, she goes out of her way to bring comfort and ease to the protagonist.

Yet, she never fails to make their heart race...

From park strolls to ramen shops, from courage-testing adventures to quaint inns, the two enjoyed a series of dates.

But...

Lurking in the background are memories that can’t quite be recalled. A reason that binds Mare to this world, preventing her from finding eternal peace.

What hidden past do these two share?

Will you join her in an enchanting and tender journey of companionship and mystery?

🤍Characters🤍

NightMare (CV: NightMare)

A sweet and pure ghost girl who appeared to bring restful sleep to the weary protagonist.

Her memories from her life are hazy, preventing her from finding eternal peace.

🤍 SPECIAL THANKS 🤍

Starring / Main Cast: NightMare

Illustrator: Hisagi

Story: Miruku Yashiki

👻👻👻Everyone part of Night to Meet Chu!!👻👻👻

🤍 Recommended for those who 🤍

✅ Enjoy VTubers and ASMR

✅ Want to be pampered by a cute girl

✅ Want a heart-throbbing experience with a girl

🐇 Novel Game Brand "Rabbitfoot" 🐇

A novel game brand that delivers novel games casting active YouTubers and VTubers as game characters.

As well as using their names and nicknames, you can enjoy the different sides of your faves and feel a close connection through the novel game that you cannot experience in the usual streaming or video uploads.

🤍Official Site🤍

⚠️Guidelines for Streaming and Video Posting⚠️

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the games include a scene with a girl in a bathing suit at a hot spring, a situation where a girl is approached by a girl who is overly fond of her, a morning in bed with a girl, and a situation where a girl was accidentally killed by a fire in the past. Sexual acts and nudity do not appear.

name: Night to Meet Chu!

subs.option_text: なぃとみ〜ちゅ！ - おばけのめあと癒しのヒトイキ - - $24.99 USD

short_description: Starring VTuber NightMare herself! An ASMR-Enhanced Visual Novel Game! What is the secret hidden your encounter and her inability to find eternal peace?
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
